data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
Granada are pushing forward but Antonio Puertas's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 1, Ball goes out of play for a Real Madrid goal kick.
Real Madrid's Karim Benzema gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
In the minute 4, Real Madrid are coming forward and Sergio Ramos gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Granada at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
Can Real Madrid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Granada's half?
In the minute 6, Ball safe as Granada is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards the away team a throw-in.
Rodrygo for Real Madrid drives towards goal at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 8, Granada awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Robert Kenedy of Granada smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a Granada throw-in in Real Madrid's half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Granada at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
Throw-in Real Madrid.
Throw-in for Granada in their own half.
In the minute 12, Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
Granada have a dangerous throw-in.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 15, Toni Kroos of Real Madrid gets in a strike, but is off target.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards Granada a goal kick.
Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 17, Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Granada in their own half.
Real Madrid's Lucas Vazquez has been booked in Madrid.
Real Madrid have a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Real Madrid close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Granada.
Antonio Puertas (Granada) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 20, Granada to take a throw-in in Real Madrid territory.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a throw-in for Real Madrid, close to Granada's area.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Granada.
Real Madrid's Karim Benzema gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Granada defender.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Real Madrid in the half of Granada.
Granada will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Real Madrid.
Dimitri Foulquier (Granada) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 29, Real Madrid drive upfield and Dani Carvajal gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Granada defender.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
In Madrid, Raphael Varane (Real Madrid) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 29, It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 32, Juan Martinez Munuera awards the home team a throw-in.
Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
Real Madrid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Granada in their own half.
Throw-in for Real Madrid in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Madrid to check on Rodrygo, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 37, Goal kick for Granada at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
Marco Asensio (Real Madrid) has replaced the possibly injured Rodrygo at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
Throw-in for Real Madrid at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
In the minute 39, Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Granada in the half of Real Madrid.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 42, Real Madrid's Federico Valverde has run offside.
Throw-in for Real Madrid in their own half.
Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 43, Throw-in Granada.
Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 44, Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Granada.
Antonio Puertas of Granada is pulled up for offside.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Granada in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 45, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Domingos Duarte.
In the minute 46, Juan Martinez Munuera has blown to start the second-half.
In Madrid Granada attack through Carlos Neva. The finish is off target, however.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards Real Madrid a goal kick.
In the minute 46, Granada’s Domingos Duarte is on his feet again at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
Throw-in for Granada at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
Free kick Real Madrid.
In the minute 49, Granada awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Granada in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
In the minute 52, Can Granada capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Real Madrid's half?
Throw-in for Real Madrid at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 55, Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
Throw-in high up the field for Real Madrid in Madrid.
Granada needs to be cautious. Real Madrid have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 55, So close for Real Madrid as Marco Asensio's shot comes back off the post.
Real Madrid's Federico Valverde is on target but unsuccessful.
Toni Kroos for Real Madrid gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 56, Ball goes out of play for a Granada goal kick.
Goal! Casemiro heads Real Madrid into a 1-0 lead.
Marco Asensio with an assist there.
In the minute 58, Antonio Puertas gets his shot on target but fails to score for Granada.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards the away team a throw-in.
Real Madrid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Real Madrid in the half of Granada.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The away team have replaced Yan Eteki with Luis Suarez. This is the first substitution made today by Diego Martinez.
In the minute 63, Granada make their second substitution with Alberto Soro replacing Robert Kenedy.
Real Madrid are whistled for offside.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
In the minute 66, In Madrid, Raphael Varane (Real Madrid) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a throw-in for Granada, close to Real Madrid's area.
Throw-in Granada.
In the minute 67, Real Madrid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Granada in their own half.
Can Granada get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Madrid's half?
In the minute 71, Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Real Madrid in Madrid.
Real Madrid's Lucas Vazquez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 72, Granada have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Granada in the half of Real Madrid.
Diego Martinez is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano with Quini replacing Dimitri Foulquier.
Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, Jorge Molina is replacing Roberto Soldado for Granada at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
Granada push forward at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano and Jorge Molina gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Real Madrid defence.
In the minute 75, Juan Martinez Munuera awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Real Madrid.
Throw-in for Real Madrid at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
In the minute 78, Vinicius Junior is replacing Lucas Vazquez for the home team.
Isco is on a sub for Federico Valverde for Real Madrid.
Real Madrid needs to be cautious. Granada have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 79, Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Granada in their own half.
Throw-in for Granada at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
In the minute 81, Can Granada capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Real Madrid's half?
Free kick in a good position for Granada!
Dani Carvajal (Real Madrid) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 82, Ball goes out of play for a Real Madrid goal kick.
In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Diego Martinez (Granada) is making a fifth substitution, with German Sanchez replacing Jesus Vallejo.
In the minute 85, Juan Martinez Munuera awards Real Madrid a goal kick.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Real Madrid.
Yangel Herrera (Granada) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 87, Real Madrid have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Granada in their own half.
Free kick for Granada in their own half.
In the minute 89, Free kick Granada.
German Sanchez's header is off-target for Granada.
Goal kick for Real Madrid at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
Granada to take a throw-in in Real Madrid territory.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards the home team a throw-in.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Isco (Real Madrid) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
Real Madrid's Marco Asensio breaks free at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a Granada throw-in in Real Madrid's half.
It's 2-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
It's now 2-0 in Madrid as Karim Benzema scores for Real Madrid.
Isco instrumental with a fine assist.
